title: The Maintenance was a mistake
body: After the maintenance, everything has gone to Sh** with my league. I get constant frame drops. And my ping went up to 80. The same as the LAN server which is kind of sad. You maintenance did nothing to improve connectivity, or any issues. Only brought up more for me. It got to the point where I use Haste now because it lowers my ping. Not advertising but seriously. It got to THAT point. Thanks Riot

replies.body: Hmmmm I wonder if something like ports might need to be updated after the patch or maybe your DNS could use a good flushing. Give those a try, as well as the rest of the steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and let me know if that's able to help.
